burgers.name: Ring of Fire
burgers.description: A gressy, spicy, calmaized, fulling slice of fire that isnt for the faint of heart
indgredients: house-smoked bacon, roasted jalapenos, roasted habaneros, grilled onions and cheddar cheese
burgers.included: Served with French Fries. Substitute Side Salad, Beer-Battered Onion Rings, Rosemary-Garlic Fries, Cajun Fries or Fried Pickles for $2
burgers.subsitutues: Substitute a Garden Veggie Burger or Spicy Chipotle Black Bean Burger for $1.5

burgers.name: Dealer
burgers.description: A strange combo of hevanly flavors, spicy but not too spicy
burgers.subsitutues: All burgers can be made with a veggie patty + $1
